thread.title: Jean
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Jean

author: Jean
title: Jean
text:
I dealt with Rhoda throughout a very trying time. Her compassionate approach to helping me deal with my situation truly made it bearable.
I had spoken with other firms while working my way towards making the decision to file but was left feeling like I oughta be embarrassed.
